field.name: LOCAL_RING
field.description: Parity error on DCR ring.

field.name: SLAVE_BAD_STORE
field.description: Outbound store with ttype not equal to 100000

field.name: SLAVE_BAD_LOAD
field.description: Outbound load with lwarx ttype (001001)

field.name: SLAVE_VALIDSRC_PARITY
field.description: Parity error on outbound source, valid from request switch

field.name: SLVOUT_CTRL_ECC
field.description: Uncorrectable error in outbound control from request switch

field.name: SLAVE_FIFO_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in outbound request FIFO control

field.name: SLAVE_FIFO_SM
field.description: State machine error in outbound request FIFO

field.name: SLAVE_FIFO_DATA
field.description: Parity error in outbound request FIFO data

field.name: SLVOUT_WDATA_ECC
field.description: Uncorrectable error in outbound write data from request switch

field.name: PCIE_IW_ADDR_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in address received from PCIe inbound write interface

field.name: PCIE_IW_BEN_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in byte enables received from PCIe inbound write interface

field.name: PCIE_IW_WDATA_UE
field.description: Uncorrectable ECC error in write data received from PCIe inbound write interface

field.name: PCIE_IR_IO_RCVD
field.description: IO space request received by PCIe inbound read interface

field.name: PCIE_IR_ATTR
field.description: Parity error in attributes received from PCIe inbound read interface

field.name: PCIE_IR_RANGE_START
field.description: Received inbound PCIe read request with out-of-range start address

field.name: PCIE_IR_RANGE_END
field.description: Received inbound PCIe read request with out-of-range end address

field.name: PCIE_IR_MAX_TOP
field.description: Received inbound PCIe read request exceeding 64GB maximum boundary

field.name: PCIE_IR_BOUNDS
field.description: Received inbound PCIe read request that is not within configured bounds

field.name: PCIE_IR_SM
field.description: Illegal state reached by PCIe inbound read state machine

field.name: SR_RD_ATTR
field.description: Parity error in response switch read attributes

field.name: SR_TAG_FIFO
field.description: Parity error in response switch read attribute tag FIFO

field.name: SW_STACK
field.description: Parity error in inbound request switch bookkeeping stack

field.name: SW_RA_CTRL
field.description: Parity error in inbound request switch control FIFO

field.name: SW_TGT_FIFO
field.description: Parity error in inbound request switch target FIFO

field.name: SW_GRANT
field.description: Parity error in inbound request switch grant attributes

field.name: MSYNC_GEN
field.description: Parity error in msync generation for two cycles

field.name: BEDRAM_SIZE
field.description: Unsupported 128-byte request made to the boot eDRAM

field.name: BEDRAM_FIFO
field.description: Parity error in boot eDRAM attribute FIFO

field.name: BEDRAM_COUNTER
field.description: Boot eDRAM counter overflow or underflow

field.name: PCIE_MEM_SIZE
field.description: Outbound request exceeded 16 bytes in size

field.name: PCIE_CFGIO_WR_SIZE
field.description: Outbound configuration or IO write request exceeded 4 bytes in size

field.name: PCIE_CFGIO_RD_SIZE
field.description: Outbound configuration or IO read request exceeded 4 bytes in size

field.name: PCIE_OR_ALIGN
field.description: Outbound read request not aligned within 16-byte boundaries

field.name: PCIE_OR_ATTR
field.description: Parity error in outbound read response attributes

field.name: PCIE_OR_ECC
field.description: Uncorrectable ECC error in outbound read response data

field.name: MSI_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in an MSI register

field.name: UPC_REQ_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in UPC request attributes

field.name: UPC_WDATA_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in UPC request write data

field.name: UPC_RDATA_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in UPC read response data

field.name: UPC_REQ_TIMEOUT
field.description: UPC request timeout with no ack

field.name: GEA_REQ_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in GEA request attributes

field.name: GEA_WDATA_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in GEA request write data

field.name: GEA_RDATA_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in GEA read response data

field.name: GEA_REQ_TIMEOUT
field.description: GEA request timeout with no ack

field.name: L2_IFC_FIFO_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in L2 interface FIFOs

field.name: L2_SLICE_SELECT
field.description: Parity error in L2 slice select input

field.name: RDBUF_A_STACK_PTY
field.description: Parity error in BeDRAM port of outbound read return bookkeeping stack

field.name: RDBUF_B_STACK_PTY
field.description: Parity error in shared port of outbound read return bookkeeping stack

field.name: RDBUF_SR_FIFO_PTY
field.description: Parity error in response switch request FIFO

field.name: RDBUF_READY_REG
field.description: Parity error in response switch ready register

field.name: RDBUF_SR_GNT
field.description: Parity error in response switch grant attributes

field.name: TI_ADDR_PARITY
field.description: Parity error in address received with testint request

field.name: PCIE_INT_A
field.description: PCIe legacy interrupt A

field.name: PCIE_INT_B
field.description: PCIe legacy interrupt B

field.name: PCIE_INT_C
field.description: PCIe legacy interrupt C

field.name: PCIE_INT_D
field.description: PCIe legacy interrupt D

field.name: UPC_COUNTER_OVF
field.description: UPC counter overflow

field.name: SW_SWITCH
field.description: Request switch error

field.name: SR_SWITCH
field.description: Response switch error

field.name: SI_SWITCH
field.description: Invalidate switch error

field.name: SLAVE_DECODE
field.description: Decode miss in outbound request.
